name: TRACTOR BEAM
description: basic mode: Move a target 0, 1, or 2 squares to a square you can see, and give it 1 damage.in punisher mode: Choose a target 0, 1, or 2 moves away from you. Move the target to your squareand deal 3 damage to it.Notes: You can move a target even if you can't see it. The target ends up in a place where you can see and damage it. The moves do not have to be in the same direction.
